# ğŸŒ€ ezfetch

**ezfetch** is a cross-platform, minimalist system information tool written in Python. Inspired by [Neofetch](https://github.com/dylanaraps/neofetch), it displays system details with a stylish ASCII logo in your terminal.

---

## âœ¨ Features

- âœ… System info: OS, kernel, uptime, CPU, RAM, disk, IP, shell
- ğŸ¨ Colored, clean terminal output
- ğŸŒ€ Custom Sharingan-style ASCII art (you can replace it)
- âš™ï¸ Cross-platform (Linux, macOS, Windows)
- ğŸ§ª Open-source and extendable
